DOC.brief_summary: The primary objective study evaluate safety efficacy Omiganan ( CLS001 ) topical gel compare vehicle topical gel apply daily 12 week female subject moderate severe inflammatory acne vulgaris .
DOC.brief_title: A Study Evaluate Safety Efficacy Omiganan ( CLS001 ) Topical Gel Versus Vehicle Female Subjects With Moderate Severe Acne Vulgaris
DOC.criteria: Nonpregnant female subject ≥ 12 year age facial acne vulgaris Subjects Investigator 's Global Assessment ( IGA ) Inflammatory Lesions Acne Vulgaris Moderate ( 3 ) Severe ( 4 ) Baseline . Subjects ≥ 30 facial inflammatory lesion Subjects < 10 > 75 facial noninflammatory lesion Subjects > 3 facial nodular cystic lesion Baseline Standard exclusion criterion
